author: Austin Evans
title: The Steam Deck Killer is Here…Almost

author: Austin Evans
description:
Subscribe for more! https://www.youtube.com/austinevans
Check out our @thisis channel! https://www.youtube.com/thisis
As well as the @Denki channel! https://www.youtube.com/@Denki

So Lenovo just dropped the first non-Valve handheld running SteamOS: the Lenovo Legion Go S Powered by SteamOS...but is paying $600 for slightly better specs really worth it when the Steam Deck OLED exists? I've been testing this thing for two weeks and there's some stuff that might surprise you about battery life, performance and whether SteamOS on third-party hardware is actually ready for prime time.

Chapter Titles:
0:00 Intro 
1:46 Unboxing
3:03 First Impressions
4:23 Performance
5:41 Travel
6:40 Battery & Cooling
7:49 Hardware & Price
9:27 SteamOS
11:38 The Future
title: This Should Be Better Than The Steam Deck. So Why Isn't It?
